info.title: Helpdesk API - REST
info.description: API REST del Sistema Helpdesk. Migración de GraphQL a REST con autenticación JWT.

post.description: Create a new user account and return authentication tokens
Authenticate user with email and password
Authenticate user using Google ID token

get.description: Get current authenticated user status and session information

post.description: Verify user email with token. Always returns 200.
Resend verification email to authenticated user (rate limited: 3 per 5 minutes)

get.description: Get email verification status for authenticated user
Verifica el estado de la API

post.description: Mark onboarding process as completed for authenticated user
Request a password reset. Always returns success for security.
Confirm password reset with new password and token/code

get.description: Validate password reset token and return its status

post.description: Get a new access token using refresh token from cookie or header. For Swagger testing, use header X-Refresh-Token with the refresh token value.

parameters.name: X-Refresh-Token
parameters.description: Refresh token (for testing in Swagger). If not provided, uses refresh_token from HttpOnly cookie.

200.description: Token refreshed successfully. New refresh token in Set-Cookie header.

get.description: Get all active sessions for authenticated user

post.description: Logout from current session or all sessions

delete.description: Revoke a specific session from another device

get.description: Returns a paginated list of active companies with minimal information (id, code, name, logo). Public endpoint without authentication required.
Returns paginated list of companies with extended information for exploration. Includes follow indicators specific to authenticated user. Requires JWT authentication.

parameters.name: followed_by_me
parameters.description: Show only companies followed by the user

get.description: Returns complete company list with all information and calculated fields. Requires HELPDESK_ADMIN or COMPANY_ADMIN role. COMPANY_ADMIN users can only see their own company.

200.description: Complete company list with administrative information

post.description: Creates a new company directly without request process. Only available for users with PLATFORM_ADMIN role. Automatically assigns COMPANY_ADMIN role to the designated administrator user.

admin_user_id.description: User ID who will be the company administrator (required)

get.description: Returns all information about a specific company including calculated fields, admin info, and user follow status. Requires authentication and access permissions.

403.description: Forbidden (no permission to view this company)

patch.description: Updates information of an existing company. Requires being PLATFORM_ADMIN or COMPANY_ADMIN owner of the company. All fields are optional.

parameters.name: company
parameters.description: Company ID or UUID to update

requestBody.description: Data to update (all fields are optional)

403.description: Forbidden (no permission to update this company)

get.summary: List companies followed by authenticated user
get.description: Returns all companies that the authenticated user is following, ordered by most recent follow first. Includes company details and user-specific metrics like ticket count.

200.description: List of companies followed by the authenticated user

get.summary: Check if user follows a company
get.description: Verifies if the authenticated user is currently following the specified company.

post.description: Allows the authenticated user to start following a company. If already following, returns current follow status. Rate limited to 20 requests per hour.

429.description: Too many follow requests (rate limit exceeded)

delete.description: Allows the authenticated user to stop following a company. Returns an error if the user is not currently following the company.

409.description: User is not following this company

get.description: Obtiene el catálogo completo de industrias para selección en formularios. Endpoint público sin autenticación requerida. Opcionalmente incluye conteos de empresas activas por industria.

parameters.name: with_counts
parameters.description: Incluir conteo de empresas activas por industria (default: false)

activeCompaniesCount.description: Conteo de empresas activas (solo si with_counts=true)

post.description: Approves a company request. Automatically: creates company, creates admin user, assigns COMPANY_ADMIN role, generates temporary password (valid 7 days), sends email with credentials

message.example: Solicitud aprobada exitosamente. Se ha creado la empresa 'TechCorp Bolivia' y se envió un email con las credenciales de acceso a admin@techcorp.com.bo.

description.example: Empresa líder en soluciones tecnológicas para el sector empresarial

post.description: Rejects a company request. Automatically: marks as REJECTED, sends email to requester with rejection reason

message.example: La solicitud de empresa 'TechCorp Bolivia' ha sido rechazada. Se ha enviado un email a admin@techcorp.com.bo con la razón del rechazo.

reason.example: La documentación proporcionada no cumple con los requisitos mínimos establecidos. Por favor, adjunte el NIT actualizado y el testimonio de constitución.

get.description: Returns paginated list of company requests. Requires PLATFORM_ADMIN role. Includes eager loading of reviewer and createdCompany.

businessDescription.example: We are a leading technology solutions company with over 10 years of experience providing enterprise software solutions to businesses worldwide.

requestMessage.example: We need a professional helpdesk system for our customer support team of 50+ agents.

post.description: Public endpoint to create new company request. Rate limit: 3 requests per hour. Automatic validation of duplicate email in pending requests.

company_description.example: We are a leading technology solutions company with over 10 years of experience...

request_message.example: We need a professional helpdesk system for our customer support

businessDescription.example: We are a leading technology solutions company...

requestMessage.example: We need a professional helpdesk system for our customer support

422.description: Validation error - invalid data or duplicate email

429.description: Rate limit exceeded - maximum 3 requests per hour

get.description: Retrieve the complete profile information of the currently authenticated user

patch.description: Update profile information for the currently authenticated user. Throttled: 30 requests/hour. All fields are optional.

requestBody.description: Profile fields to update. All fields are optional.

firstName: First name must be at least 2 characters

patch.description: Update preferences for the currently authenticated user. Throttled: 50 requests/hour. All fields are optional.

requestBody.description: Preference fields to update. All fields are optional.

get.description: Returns list of all available roles in the system. Only PLATFORM_ADMIN or COMPANY_ADMIN can view roles

post.summary: Assign a role to a user
post.description: Assign a role to a user with optional company context. Only PLATFORM_ADMIN or COMPANY_ADMIN can assign roles. Returns 200 if role was reactivated, 201 if newly assigned. Throttled: 100 requests/hour per authenticated user. Reactivates revoked roles if applicable.

companyId.description: Required if roleCode is COMPANY_ADMIN or AGENT

delete.summary: Remove a role from a user
delete.description: Deactivate a role assignment (soft delete). Only PLATFORM_ADMIN or COMPANY_ADMIN can remove roles. COMPANY_ADMIN can only remove roles from their own company

get.description: Returns complete user info with profile, roleContexts, and statistics

get.summary: List users with filters and pagination
get.description: Returns paginated list of users with optional filters. PLATFORM_ADMIN sees all users, COMPANY_ADMIN sees only users from their company

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by email, user_code, or profile name

parameters.name: recentActivity
parameters.description: Filter users active in last 7 days

data.description: Array of UserResource objects (15 fields each)

get.description: Returns complete user information. PLATFORM_ADMIN can view any user, COMPANY_ADMIN can view users from their company only, any user can view themselves

delete.description: Soft delete a user (sets status to deleted and deleted_at timestamp). Only PLATFORM_ADMIN can perform this action. User cannot delete themselves

403.description: Only platform administrators can delete users

put.description: Suspend or activate a user. Only PLATFORM_ADMIN can perform this action

403.description: Only platform administrators can update user status

bearerAuth.description: JWT Bearer Token. Include in Authorization header: Bearer <token>
